paragraph.paragraph: In the Edit menu, the following commands are available:

list.item: ./30_clipboard_functionality.xml Paste : Paste text from the clipboard.
./20_selection.xml Select All : Select the entire text.

../10_browsing_tools/60_search_tool.xml Find : Show and go to the
../10_browsing_tools/60_search_tool.xml search panel .

../10_browsing_tools/60_search_tool.xml Replace : Show and go to the
../10_browsing_tools/60_search_tool.xml search panel with replace option activated.
Toggle Line Numbers: Show or hide the line numbers in the current editor.

./50_search_functionality.xml Search :
./50_search_functionality.xml Find next : Find the next occurrence of the last searched expression.
./50_search_functionality.xml Find previous : Find the previous occurrence of the last searched expression.
./50_search_functionality.xml Find selection : Find the next occurrence of the selected text.
